workshoptitle: Simplify User Management with Oracle Autonomous Database and Oracle Cloud Identity

tutorials.title: Introduction
tutorials.description: The Introduction is always second for LiveLabs. The title and contents menu title match for the Introduction.

tutorials.title: Get Started
tutorials.description: This is the prerequisites for customers using Free Trial and Paid tenancies, and Always Free accounts (if applicable). The title of the lab and the Contents Menu title (the title above) match for Prerequisite lab. This lab is always first.

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Create Autonomous Database and set up environment
tutorials.description: Create Autonomus Database and other required resources

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Generate ADB Wallet and Set IAM as Identity Provider
tutorials.description: Generate your wallet file & use it to connect and enable IAM

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Create IAM Credentials and log into the database
tutorials.description: Create IAM credentials for users and access ADB with those credentials

tutorials.title: Lab 4: Cleanup lab environment (optional)
tutorials.description: Clean up resources created during lab

tutorials.title: Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
